ymir.title: Ymir - a tool for working with probabilistic models of immune receptor assembling

algos.title: Algorithms and their parameters for the statistical inference in Ymir (values for a parameter '-a' for inference.py)

EM.comment: Classic EM algorithm for the statistical inference of a model's parameters from (Murugan et al., 2012)

niter.comment: maximum number of iterations to perform (default = 20)

formats.title: Possible input formats for Ymir (values for a parameter '-f' for compute.py and inference.py)

tcr.comment: format of data frames from an R package tcR saved with the tcR::repSave() function

mitcr.comment: format for cloneset files outputted by MiTCR

models.title: Available generation models in the current Ymir distribution (values for a parameter '-m' for scripts)

compute.comment: A Python 3 script to compute generation probabilities of immune receptors. Run: '$python3 compute.py <parameters>'. To get help: 'run $python3 compute.py -h' to get help

inference.comment: A Python 3 script to perform the statistical inference of marginal probabilities of a generation model. To get help: run '$python3 inference.py <parameters>'. Run '$python3 inference.py -h' to get help

generate.comment: A Python 3 script for generation a pre-selection repertoire of immunce receptors. Run: '$python3 generate.py <parameters>'. To get help: run '$python3 generate.py -h' to get help
